statements: SELECT * FROM SoftwareUpdates;
SELECT software_version, update_description FROM SoftwareUpdates;
SELECT * FROM SoftwareUpdates ORDER BY update_time DESC;
SELECT update_description FROM SoftwareUpdates WHERE software_version = 'v1.0';
SELECT executed_by_user, COUNT(*) AS update_count FROM SoftwareUpdates GROUP BY executed_by_user;
SELECT * FROM SoftwareUpdates WHERE software_version = '1.0' ORDER BY update_time DESC;
SELECT update_id, update_description, executed_by_user FROM SoftwareUpdates WHERE software_version = '2.0' ORDER BY update_time ASC;
SELECT software_version, update_description FROM SoftwareUpdates WHERE executed_by_user = 'admin' AND update_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT software_version FROM SoftwareUpdates WHERE update_description LIKE '%bug%' ORDER BY software_version;
SELECT * FROM SoftwareUpdates WHERE software_version IN ('1.0', '1.1', '2.0') AND executed_by_user LIKE 'user%';
SELECT * FROM software_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT software_version, update_description FROM software_updates WHERE software_version = 'v2.0';
SELECT id, software_version, update_date FROM software_updates WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_name LIKE 'Living Room%' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT device_name, software_version FROM smart_home_devices WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM software_updates WHERE software_version = '1.0.0';
SELECT software_version, update_date, update_description FROM software_updates WHERE update_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT software_version, COUNT(*) AS total_updates FROM software_updates GROUP BY software_version;
SELECT device_name, software_version FROM smart_home_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, software_version, last_updated FROM smart_home_devices WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM software_updates;
SELECT version_number, update_date FROM software_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices WHERE installation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT update_description FROM software_updates WHERE version_number >= 2.0;
SELECT update_id, update_date, update_success FROM update_history WHERE update_success = TRUE ORDER BY update_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM software_updates WHERE version_number > 2.5 ORDER BY update_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE installation_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT update_description FROM software_updates WHERE update_date >= '2020-01-01' AND update_success = TRUE;
SELECT u.update_id, u.update_date, d.device_name FROM update_history u JOIN devices d ON u.device_id = d.device_id WHERE u.update_success = TRUE ORDER BY u.update_date ASC;
SELECT d.device_name, s.version_number FROM devices d JOIN software_updates s ON d.device_id = s.id WHERE s.version_number = (SELECT MAX(version_number) FROM software_updates);
SELECT * FROM SmartHomeSystemUpdates;
SELECT update_description, update_version FROM SmartHomeSystemUpdates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT system_id, update_version, update_date FROM SmartHomeSystemUpdates WHERE update_version >= 10;
SELECT * FROM UpdateHistory WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT system_id, update_id FROM UpdateHistory ORDER BY update_date ASC;
SELECT system_id, update_version, update_description, update_date FROM SmartHomeSystemUpdates WHERE update_version > 10 ORDER BY update_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM VersionControl WHERE supported_systems LIKE '%IOS%' ORDER BY release_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT system_id, COUNT(update_id) AS update_count FROM UpdateHistory GROUP BY system_id HAVING update_count > 3 ORDER BY system_id
SELECT system_id, update_id, update_date, status FROM UpdateHistory WHERE status = 'successful' AND update_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' LIMIT 5

SELECT ul.log_id, uh.system_id, vc.version_number, sh.update_version, ul.log_date FROM UpdateLogs AS ul JOIN UpdateHistory AS uh ON ul.update_id = uh.update_id JOIN VersionControl AS vc ON vc.version_id = vc.version_id JOIN SmartHomeSystemUpdates AS sh ON sh.system_id = uh.system_id ORDER BY ul.log_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM software_updates;
SELECT software_version, update_date FROM software_updates WHERE update_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, firmware_version FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT update_id, device_id, update_status FROM updates_log WHERE update_status = 'failed';
SELECT * FROM software_updates;
SELECT update_id, software_version, update_date FROM software_updates WHERE update_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT device_name, firmware_version FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT u.update_id, u.software_version, l.update_status FROM software_updates u INNER JOIN updates_log l ON u.update_id = l.update_id WHERE l.update_status = 'SUCCESS';

SELECT u.update_id, u.software_version, d.device_name FROM software_updates u INNER JOIN updates_log l ON u.update_id = l.update_id INNER JOIN devices d ON l.device_id = d.device_id WHERE d.device_type = 'mobile';
